Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1979...
Injured on 6/14/1979 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Injured on 6/21/1980 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1980 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Injured on 4/5/1981 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1982, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1982, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1982, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 7/20/1982 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Baltimore on 4/1/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1984, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Injured on 9/11/1984 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/8/1985 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Hit 3 homeruns against New York (A), driving in 7 runs on 9/7/1988...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
